descriptions:
["DescriptionLuxuryProperty.com is delighted to present this lovely single row 4-bedroom villa at Sidra 1, Dubai Hills Estate.
• Now Available to View
• Original Price: AED.4,200,000
• Finance Available
• Garage for two cars
• BUA of 3,523 sq ft
• Plot size of 4,700 sq ft
• Single Row, Park View
• Open plan living spaces
• An en-suite maid's room
• Large master suite with walk-in dressing room and balcony
• Back patio with pool and landscaped garden
This property single row family home is a pleasant residential community nestled in beautiful green surroundings with open outdoor spaces that are ideal for taking a leisurely stroll or spending some quality time with the family. 
Sidra is made for lovers of the outdoors and features amenities designed accordingly. It is close to Dubai Hills Mall, Dubai Hills Park, and Dubai Hills Golf Course. The community is in proximity to international schools and first-rate healthcare options.
For our most discerning clients, this villa could be a perfect family home in Dubai."]
